QuestData.Title: No Vengeance on an Empty Stomach
QuestData.Description:
Now that we've gotten back to what we aimed to do, we need to have a talk tusk to tusk. That the gnoll Frostbite? The one you spoke to?
We've got a history with him.
This may take awhile to explain. You go and get some fish while I talk, pup. We need to feed everyone. They need their strength for what's next.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fish $2oa Frozen Tail Darters within Grimtusk's Hideaway.
QuestData.RewardText:
Now you know what's at stake.
Time to get moving.

Objectives.Objective: Fishing skill learned from Young Quickhands
